pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, January 30, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, January 30, 2017:

Québec, Quebec

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Sophie Grégoire Trudeau, along with Jean-Yves Duclos, Minister of Families, Children and Social Development and MP for Québec; Rona Ambrose, Leader of the Official Opposition and Interim Leader of the Conservative Party; Thomas Mulcair, Leader of the New Democratic Party; Rhéal Fortin, Leader of the Bloc Québecois; Elizabeth May, Leader of the Green Party; and Joël Lightbound, MP for Louis-Hébert, will attend a vigil for the victims of the fatal shooting at the Centre culturel islamique de Québec.

Église Notre-Dame de Foy
820 rue du Chanoine Martin
Sainte-Foy-Sillery-Cap-Rouge, Quebec

Note for media :

  • Open coverage 


Note: all times local
